actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the period of funding of State medicaid fraud control units.

summary.text: Extends until October 1, 1982, the funding of State Medicaid (title XIX of the Social Security Act) fraud control units.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the period of funding of State medicaid fraud control units.
